title: Lost my promos because of a black screen?
body:
So I queue up for my Promos (1-1) but when champ select loads theres just a black screen and it dosen't allow me to do anything. Eventually the time run out and I lose my promos! Anyone know why this happened and if theres a fix for this?

Edit: Tried going again still same

replies.body: ty for being a dick... my screen also went gray and now i lost promos

Sorry to hear that this black screen happened during your promos.  :(  We've been investigating this issue and found that a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) can server as a current workaround.  Any logs you'd also like to provide us through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) can help us continue investigating these reports too.  The logs can be grabbed through our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  I hope that helps!

The same thing just happened to me. I dodged during a promotion series because my entire client went black as soon as I entered champion select. I could still hear the sound effects but I couldn't do anything.
